name: Dodge Fall (Bwuh21)
description:
Overview

This is a multiplayer and single-player grappling game hope you have fun! This game is still in Pre Alpha so if you see any game break bugs please report them in the discord and I will try and fix them.

Controls 

Left Mouse Button to Grapple (Must click inside black circle)

Left Shift to switch gravity

Menu Music

Jeremy Blake - Powerup! 

Discord

https://discord.gg/VdTbaxZFQP
